title: Slow Cooker Cauliflower Bolognese with Zucchini Noodles
directions: Place all of the ingredients for the bolognese into a crockpot. Place the crockpot on high and let cook for 3.5 hours.
When done, smash the cauliflower with a potato masher or fork until the florets break up to create a "bolognese."
Spoon the bolognese over bowls of zucchini noodles.
ingredients: 1 head of cauliflower, cut up into florets
2 14oz cans diced tomatoes, no salt added
